metadata.name: Generate Implementation Plan
metadata.shortDescription: Transform design document into executable implementation task plan
metadata.description: Converts layered architecture design into detailed implementation plan with task breakdown, execution instructions, and bootstrap preparation. Generates Task 0.0 for context extraction and creates executable task sequence following the onboarding competency pattern.
objectives: Extract layers and components from design document
Generate Task 0.0 for extracting task contexts (current 0.3 pattern)
Create task breakdown with dependencies, sequencing, and execution information
Document execution strategy and output structure
metadata.author: OLAF Framework Core Team
